lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony spent the U.S. Olympic basketball team's precious day off running a two-hour town hall meeting at a South Los Angeles youth center because he can't sleep anymore.

headline.print_headline: Carmelo Anthony Gathers Athletes, Cops, Kids in Conversation
headline.main: Carmelo Anthony Gathers Athletes, Cops, Kids in Conversation
